item.title: A ban on feeding pigeons ruffles lots of feathers in Mumbai

item.title: From 400-year-old globes to cosmic shrouds: A Maine library brings maps to life
item.description: From 400-year-old globes to cosmic funeral shrouds, how the Osher Map Library in Maine shows people that maps aren't just for navigation — but windows...

item.title: A fire at a popular nightclub in India's Goa state kills at least 25, officials say
item.description: At least 25 people, including tourists, were killed in a fire at a popular nightclub in India's Goa state, the state's chief minister said Sunday.
